league.League

    Package Description
    league  
    utilities  

    • Uses of League in league

      Methods in league with parameters of type League 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void ManageTeamOps.addPlayer(League theLeague, Team theTeam, java.util.Scanner keyboard)
      Add a free agent player to the team.
      static void ManageTeamOps.commissionerTools(League theLeague, java.util.Scanner keyboard)
      Only available to the commissioner - edit scores, edit standings, remove accepted trades after they are processed.
      static void ManageTeamOps.dropPlayer(League theLeague, Team theTeam, java.util.Scanner keyboard)
      Remove a player from the team and make the player a free agent.
      static void ManageTeamOps.editLineup(League theLeague, Team theTeam, java.util.Scanner keyboard)
      Move players between the bench and starting positions
      static void ManageTeamOps.editScores(League theLeague, java.util.Scanner keyboard)
      Only available to the commissioner - edit this week's scores, for all managers to see.
      static void ManageTeamOps.editStandings(League theLeague, java.util.Scanner keyboard)
      Only available to the commissioner - edit the season-long record for each team.
      static void ManageTeamOps.editTeamName(League theLeague, Team theTeam, java.util.Scanner keyboard)
      Change the name of the team.
      static void ManageTeamOps.proposeTrade(League theLeague, Team theTeam, java.util.Scanner keyboard)
      Send a message to another team offering to trade players.
      static void ManageTeamOps.reviewAcceptedTrade(League theLeague, java.util.Scanner keyboard)
      Only available to the commissioner - once the accepted trade has been processed, the message alerting the league to the trade can be removed.
      static void ManageTeamOps.reviewTrade(League theLeague, Team theTeam, java.util.Scanner keyboard)
      Respond to a trade that has been offered by another manager.
